root.name: Waku Waku Puyo Puyo Dungeon
root.description: OverviewWaku Waku Puyo Puyo Dungeon is a dungeon-crawler developed by Compile. It is a spinoff of the Puyo Puyo series, which itself uses characters from Madou Monogatari. The game has many elements typical of roguelikes, including turn-based movement. Players take control of either Arle Nadja (with Carbuncle), Rulue (with Minotauros), or Schezo Wegey and battle their way through several element-themed dungeons headed by recurring Madou Monogatari enemies such as Draco Centauros, Suketoudara, and Witch.
